titleInfo.title: Cedarwood Publishing Co. Artists with Curley Rhodes Quote (with signature)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: One color offset printing plate (red on silver) advertising songs by Cedarwood Publishing Company artists. The printing plate features a quote by Curley Rhodes and his signature. The plate also features photographs of Webb Pierce, Ray Price, Ernest Tubb, Carl Smith, Stonewall Jackson, Jerry Wallace, Max Powell, Wayne Walker, Mel Tillis, Bobby Sykes, Bobbi Staff, and Bobbie Martin.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
